ComicInfo.Title: Retrieval 2; Trends; Skin Deep
ComicInfo.Summary:
John Gallaway rejected Miracleman's new world, rejected companionship, rejected love â€” until the night Miraclewoman visited him...
The schoolyard rebels strut their stuff and debate the teenage idol of The Golden Age, Johnny Bates, in "Trends."
Miracleman explores deeper into Infra-Space in "Retrieval."
Including material originally presented in MIRACLEMAN (1985) #18, plus bonus content.
Story Titles and Extras"Skin Deep", "Trends" and "Retrieval, Part 2" from Miracleman #18, August 1990Miracleman Behind the Scenes*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Buckingham | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Frank Cho (a) & Jason Keith (c) | 2 | Var | Variant Cover | Paul Pope | 3 |
